name: Flubbergusted
description:
You are a flubber knight that has been sent to this kingdom to restore peace, defeat the veggie enemies and collect the missing mementos of their victims, take these token and deliver them to your nearest enchantress so that they can get rid of this pesky enemies.

CONTROLS:

Hold right mouse / Hold RT to grapple with your small intestine
Press left mouse button/ B  to slice the enemies down

look at the items and Press right mouse button/ Hold RT to pick them up
Hold E/ Hold Y when you have an item to be guided to the enchantress
Press R/ RB on the vicinity of the enchatress to give the item( if it's the corresponding item for her )
Press Q/ LT to open your inventory
